attributes.action: Stop Foreign Police Forces Poaching our Police
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Australia, New Zealand, Canada and others are making Britain’s crime problems worse by “Poaching” our Police Officers who are fed up with pointless paper work, red tape and generally feeling let down by the public and the governments they vote in 

Even Plastic “Half Cop” PCSO’s will soon get “poached”. Queensland Police who took 1000 UK officers last year) have made their own version of PCSO and soon will start poaching British PCSO’s!

Subsequently manpower turnover in Britain’s Police is at an all time high, average estimated service for new recruits is only 5 to 7 years at best. This leads to the number of recruits being trained increasing to replace those leaving costing more for the taxpayer plus officers are becoming less and less experienced affecting the quality of the service provided. 

The government must do the following:

1.Make it illegal for Foreign Police forces to recruit in the UK and make it illegal for British Citizens to join them.

2.Improve conditions for Police Officers so they can do their jobs and don’t leave.
